languages.text: "А должен? После того, как вы с Инцендией {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}увели{/d} у меня {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}? Мало того, что варп-шторм растерзал мой протекторат и испортил мне охоту, так еще и дорогие соратники делят мои владения за моей спиной?" {n}Каллигос с вызовом смотрит вам в глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А должен? После того, как вы с Инцендией увели у меня Футфол? Мало того, что варп-шторм растерзал мою торговую империю и испортил мне охоту, так еще и дорогие соратники делят мои владения за моей спиной?" {n}Каллигос с вызовом смотрит вам в глаза.{/n}

languages.text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А должен? После того, как вы с Инцендией {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}увели{/d} у меня {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}? Мало того, что варп-шторм растерзал мой протекторат и испортил мне охоту, так еще и дорогие соратники делят мои владения за моей спиной?" {n}Каллигос с вызовом смотрит вам в глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia made off with my Footfall? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my trade empire and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my trade empire and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my trade empire and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

"Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia made off with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: 「俺にそうしろと？お前とインセンディアが、俺の{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}盗んだ{/d}のだろ？歪みの嵐が俺の保護領を荒らすわ狩り場は壊すわでただでさえ大変なのに、今度は大切な仲間が裏切って俺の領地を分配するだと？」{n}カリゴスは挑戦的な目つきであなたの目を見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺にそうしろと？お前とインセンディアが、俺の{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}盗んだ{/d}のだろ？歪みの嵐が俺の保護領を荒らすわ狩り場は壊すわでただでさえ大変なのに、今度は大切な仲間が裏切って俺の領地を分配するだと？」{n}カリゴスは挑戦的な目つきであなたの目を見る。{/n}

languages.text: “不然呢？{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}夺走{/d}{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的人，不就是你和因森蒂娅吗？亚空间风暴袭击了我的属地，破坏了我的狩猎。就好像这还不够倒霉似的，我最亲爱的战友们居然还背着我，瓜分了我的领土？”{n}卡里戈斯盯着你，眼神中带着挑衅的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不然呢？夺走{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的人，不就是你和因森蒂娅吗？亚空间风暴袭击了我的属地，破坏了我的狩猎。就好像这还不够倒霉似的，我最亲爱的战友们居然还背着我，瓜分了我的领土？”{n}卡里戈斯盯着你，眼神中带着挑衅的意味。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Acaso esperaba otra cosa? ¿Después de que entre Incendia y usted me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}robaran{/d} {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}? Bastante malo es que una tormenta de disformidad haya asolado mi protectorado y echado a perder mi cacería, ¡pero ahora mis querid{mf|o|a}s camaradas se dividen mis territorios a mis espaldas!». {n}Calligos te mira a los ojos, desafiante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso esperaba otra cosa? ¿Después de que entre Incendia y usted me robaran {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}? Bastante malo es que una tormenta de disformidad haya asolado mi protectorado y echado a perder mi cacería, ¡pero ahora mis querid{mf|o|a}s camaradas se dividen mis territorios a mis espaldas!». {n}Calligos te mira a los ojos, desafiante.{/n}

languages.text: « Pourquoi en serait-il autrement, après qu'Incendia et vous m'avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}arraché{/d} {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ? Comme si la tempête Warp qui a ravagé mon protectorat et gâché ma chasse ne suffisait pas, maintenant, mes petits camarades complotent dans mon dos pour se partager mon territoire. » {n}Calligos vous défie du regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi en serait-il autrement, après qu'Incendia et vous m'avez arraché {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ? Comme si la tempête Warp qui a ravagé mon protectorat et gâché ma chasse ne suffisait pas, maintenant, mes petits camarades complotent dans mon dos pour se partager mon territoire. » {n}Calligos vous défie du regard.{/n}

languages.text: "Sollte ich das denn? Nachdem Ihr und Incendia mir mein {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}weggenommen{/d} habt? Schlimm genug, dass ein Warpsturm mein Protektorat verwüstet und mir die Jagd ruiniert, und jetzt teilen auch noch meine geschätzten Kameraden meine Territorien hinter meinem Rücken unter sich auf?" {n}Calligos sieht dir herausfordernd in die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sollte ich das denn? Nachdem Ihr und Incendia mir mein {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} weggenommen habt? Schlimm genug, dass ein Warpsturm mein Protektorat verwüstet und mir die Jagd ruiniert, und jetzt teilen auch noch meine geschätzten Kameraden meine Territorien hinter meinem Rücken unter sich auf?" {n}Calligos sieht dir herausfordernd in die Augen.{/n}

languages.text: "Hoşlanmam mı gerek? İncendia'yla bir olup {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'ımı{/g} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}alıp kaçmanızın{/d} neresi hoş? Öteboyut fırtınasının protektoramı tahrip etmesi ve avımı mahvetmesi yetmiyormuş gibi bir de sevgili yoldaşlarım kalkmış, arkamdan iş çevirerek bölgelerimi paylaşmakla meşgul..." {n}Calligos, meydan okuyan bakışlarla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Am I supposed to? After you and Incendia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}made off{/d} with my {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}? It's bad enough that a warp storm has ravaged my protectorate and ruined my hunt, and now my dearest comrades are busy divvying up my territories behind my back?" {n}Calligos looks you in the eye with a challenge in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hoşlanmam mı gerek? İncendia ile bir olup {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'ımı alıp kaçmanızın neresi hoş? Bir öteboyut fırtınasının protektoramı tahrip etmesi ve avımı mahvetmesi yetmiyor gibi bir de sevgili yoldaşlarım kalkmış arkamdan iş çevirerek bölgelerimi paylaşmakla meşgul olmuş..." {n}Calligos, meydan okuyan bakışlarla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}
